Class Scenario

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.wise.api.input.Scenario
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class Scenario
extends Object
implements IWISESerializable
    Information about a weather stream.

    • Method Detail

      • setId

        public void setId(String value)
        Set the name of the scenario. Must be unique amongst the scenario collection. Cannot be null or empty.
        Throws:
        A - WISEException will be thrown if value is null or empty.

      • getName

        public String getName()
        The name of the scenario. The name must be unique amongst the scenarios.

      • setName

        public void setName(String value)
        Set the name of the scenario. Must be unique amongst the scenario collection. Cannot be null or empty.
        Throws:
        A - WISEException will be thrown if value is null or empty.

      • addBurningCondition

        public BurningConditions addBurningCondition(String date,
                                             String startTime,
                                             String endTime,
                                             double fwiGreater,
                                             double wsGreater,
                                             double rhLess,
                                             double isiGreater)
        Add a new burning condition.
        Parameters:
        date - The date that the condition is valid on. Must be formatted as 'YYYY-MM-DD'.
        startTime - The starting hour. Must be between 0 and 23 inclusive.
        endTime - The ending hour. Must be between 1 and 24 inclusive.
        fwiGreater - The minimum FWI value that will allow burning.
        wsGreater - The minimum wind speed that will allow burning.
        rhLess - The maximum relative humidity that will allow burning (as a percent [0-100]).
        isiGreater - The minimum ISI that will allow burning.

      • addIgnitionReference

        public IgnitionReference addIgnitionReference(Ignition ignition)
        Add an ignition to the scenario.
        Parameters:
        ignition - The ignition to add to the scenario.

                                               boolean primary)
        Add a weather stream to the scenario.
        Parameters:
        stream - The weather stream to add to the scenario.
        primary - Is this the primary weather stream for the scenario.
